about_the_game:
🖖 Question: Do you like "Idle Tycoon Clicker Game" ? 🖖

Start by building up your free cash flow with a clicker power business using windmills and solar panels! Supercharge your mall’s growth with a REAL business investment!

🧑‍💼 Message From Your Assistant 🧑‍💼

1️⃣ With your passion for running a mall, you can bring your vision to life just as you imagine!

2️⃣ Become the ultimate shopping mall tycoon by opening and expanding individual stores!

3️⃣ Let customers fill their shopping carts with a diverse range of products!"

🛒 Game Features 🛒

⭐️ Enjoy a casual and strategic gameplay suitable for all players.

⭐️ Immerse yourself in a realistic mall environment, including staff, customers, and buildings.

⭐️ Experience the satisfaction of managing each store in the shopping mall, as revenue accumulates automatically and grows through reinvestment.

⭐️ Explore an expanding world by opening new stores one after another.

⭐️ Witness the transformation of your stores into more sophisticated establishments as you level them up.

⭐️ Enjoy the multi-floor experience by growing a shopping mall with multiple levels, not just limited to the ground floor.

🎮 Game Progression 🎮

1️⃣ Open various stores such as cafes, game centers, gyms, food shops, and burger joints to continuously increase your sales.

2️⃣ Increase the level of your opened stores to raise product prices and generate higher revenues.

3️⃣ Once all the stores on the ground floor are open, you can expand to the second floor and beyond.

4️⃣ Expand the parking lot to accommodate more customers entering the shopping mall.

5️⃣ Once you have an adequate number of parking spaces, invest in advertising to attract more customers to the parking lot.

▶️ Start with a single store and gradually build your empire by opening new and exciting shops.

From coffee shops to high-end electronics stores, each new addition will contribute to the completion of your dream mall.

🧑‍💼 Conduct market research to identify the most profitable businesses and attract a diverse range of customers.

Design unique and captivating store layouts, offering a wide variety of products to cater to different tastes and preferences.

💰 Hire skilled staff to provide excellent customer service and ensure a seamless shopping experience.

Invest in advertising campaigns and promotional activities to attract more visitors and increase footfall in your mall.

🛒 As you continue to open new stores, watch your mall thrive and become a bustling hub of commerce and entertainment.

Expand your facilities, add amenities such as food courts and entertainment zones, and create a destination that shoppers can't resist.

📣 Make strategic decisions, manage finances effectively, and listen to customer feedback to optimize the performance of your mall.

With dedication and a keen business sense, transform each individual store into a masterpiece and build the ultimate shopping mall of your dreams!
detailed_description:
🖖 Question: Do you like "Idle Tycoon Clicker Game" ? 🖖

Start by building up your free cash flow with a clicker power business using windmills and solar panels! Supercharge your mall’s growth with a REAL business investment!

🧑‍💼 Message From Your Assistant 🧑‍💼

1️⃣ With your passion for running a mall, you can bring your vision to life just as you imagine!

2️⃣ Become the ultimate shopping mall tycoon by opening and expanding individual stores!

3️⃣ Let customers fill their shopping carts with a diverse range of products!"

🛒 Game Features 🛒

⭐️ Enjoy a casual and strategic gameplay suitable for all players.

⭐️ Immerse yourself in a realistic mall environment, including staff, customers, and buildings.

⭐️ Experience the satisfaction of managing each store in the shopping mall, as revenue accumulates automatically and grows through reinvestment.

⭐️ Explore an expanding world by opening new stores one after another.

⭐️ Witness the transformation of your stores into more sophisticated establishments as you level them up.

⭐️ Enjoy the multi-floor experience by growing a shopping mall with multiple levels, not just limited to the ground floor.

🎮 Game Progression 🎮

1️⃣ Open various stores such as cafes, game centers, gyms, food shops, and burger joints to continuously increase your sales.

2️⃣ Increase the level of your opened stores to raise product prices and generate higher revenues.

3️⃣ Once all the stores on the ground floor are open, you can expand to the second floor and beyond.

4️⃣ Expand the parking lot to accommodate more customers entering the shopping mall.

5️⃣ Once you have an adequate number of parking spaces, invest in advertising to attract more customers to the parking lot.

▶️ Start with a single store and gradually build your empire by opening new and exciting shops.

From coffee shops to high-end electronics stores, each new addition will contribute to the completion of your dream mall.

🧑‍💼 Conduct market research to identify the most profitable businesses and attract a diverse range of customers.

Design unique and captivating store layouts, offering a wide variety of products to cater to different tastes and preferences.

💰 Hire skilled staff to provide excellent customer service and ensure a seamless shopping experience.

Invest in advertising campaigns and promotional activities to attract more visitors and increase footfall in your mall.

🛒 As you continue to open new stores, watch your mall thrive and become a bustling hub of commerce and entertainment.

Expand your facilities, add amenities such as food courts and entertainment zones, and create a destination that shoppers can't resist.

📣 Make strategic decisions, manage finances effectively, and listen to customer feedback to optimize the performance of your mall.

With dedication and a keen business sense, transform each individual store into a masterpiece and build the ultimate shopping mall of your dreams!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any modern Linux distribution (64-bit)
  • Processor: Any modern processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No special sound card is required—most modern PCs with onboard audio are fully supported.
  • VR Support: No, this game is designed for standard gameplay and does not include VR support.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any modern Linux distribution (64-bit)
  • Processor: Any modern processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern GPU
  • Sound Card: No special sound card is required—most modern PCs with onboard audio are fully supported.
  • VR Support: No, this game is designed for standard gameplay and does not include VR support.
